function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variability in pathogen infectivity due to virulence, pathogen generation, and infective dose","Impact":"Difficulty in predicting and controlling the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement strict quarantine measures and regular testing to identify infected individuals","Technologies":"Advanced pathogen detection and monitoring systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and high-risk individuals","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities"},{"Description":"Survival of pathogens in the air based on environmental factors like air temperature and relative humidity","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Use of air purification systems and regulation of indoor air quality","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, UV air purifiers","People":"Individuals in indoor environments, healthcare facilities, and public spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Influence of relative humidity on pathogenic bacteria and viruses","Impact":"Uncertainty in the behavior of pathogens in different humidity conditions","Mitigation":"Research to understand pathogen response to humidity and development of strategies to mitigate risk","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, humidity control systems","People":"Researchers, public health experts, and environmental scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory agencies"}]}
